name: Earthbound Beginnings
description:
EarthBound Beginnings is finally released!

The Year is 198X. As Ninten, a young boy from Podunk with psychic powers, you must locate the eight melodies to aid the Queen of Magicant. Armed with your trusty baseball bat, youll fight crazed hippies, zombies and the occasional Magic Snail? Find out whats causing these strange phenomena in the first-ever US release of the EarthBound Beginnings game!
